title: yahoo62278
author: yahoo62278
created_time: June 27, 2023, 11:29:35 AMLast edit: September 21, 2023, 04:08:20 PM by yahoo62278
content: bitsar.com is looking to advertise their currency exchange platform and would like to hire users from Sr Member to Legendary rank to help them out.  Take a look at the site and if this is a project you would like to help out advertising for, then drop your application in here. Currently this will be a 1 week campaign with the possibility of running longer depending on the results.WEBISTEhttps://www.bitsar.comANNOUNCEMENT THREADhttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5457393.0How to ApplyCode:Bitcointalk Username:Profile linkPost Count: ..... (including this one)btc addyForum RankCurrent MeritPaymentsSr $2 per post (.000075btc)Hero $3 per post (.0001125btc)Legendary $4 per post(.00015btc)A week runs from Thursday to Wednesday and is based on the UTC timezone. Posts after 23:59 Wednesday UTC  will count for the next week.Payment will be credited every Thursday.Spreadsheethttps://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1FSvoeNlDqUYX85Jcl9l9g9H3sqWDQPyioWjDGOI9S3s/edit?usp=sharingRulesPost applications in this threadWear appropriate signature and avatar to be consideredThe week starts on Thursday and ends WednesdayPayments will be sent on WednesdaysMust make 10 posts minimum to qualify for pay25 posts maximum will be paid forSpamming mega threads will not count. Only 5 posts from mega threads will count per weekMegathreads are defined as threads with more than 15 pagesPosts must be constructive and on topicPosts must have 150 characters minimumUsers not posting enough to qualify for weekly pay can be removed with no warningExcluded Sections (WO and Serious, Sig Threads, News, Politics, Games, Off Topic, Bounties) "Off Topic", "Archives, Games and Rounds", "Investor Games", "Wall Watchers", " Serious Discussions", "Altcoin Discussions", "Lending", "News", "Politics & Society", ALL altcoin boardsPosts generated by artificial intelligence will not count towards your current payment and may result in you being removed from the campaign without pay.（If you find a post about this activity, please report it to us via pm. You will receive weekly payments instead of campaign participant)If you receive neg trust while enrolled, the offense will be looked at and could disqualify you from being paidPosts in any sig campaign or bounty threads will not countUsers will not rank up unless I announce there is an available opening1 account per person, users found to enroll with more than 1 account will be removed without payCheck this thread a few times a week as I reserve the right to modify rulesApplying in this campaign means you agree to the rules of the campaignSr It's after very long time that you're launching a new signature campaign and the best thing about it is that you're giving a chance to the member rank users to participate in this campaign. I wish you best of luck for this amazing campaign!

comments.body: Quote from: SamReomo on June 27, 2023, 11:52:34 AMQuote from: yahoo62278 on June 27, 2023, 11:29:35 AMSnipYahoo Sir congratulations on launching of this signature campaign. It's after very long time that you're launching a new signature campaign and the best thing about it is that you're giving a chance to the member rank users to participate in this campaign. I wish you best of luck for this amazing campaign!Thanks, I stopped talking with clients a few months back due to health problems that most already know about. Far as member ranks go, the owner decided we are going to only offer this to Sr member and above for now. This may change at a later date.

Far as member ranks go, the owner decided we are going to only offer this to Sr member and above for now. This may change at a later date.I guess that was the case as, its really been a long time and perhaps, you had to give yourself a break following health challenges at the time.Last I worked with you was when I was a member. You always happen to be the manager that give the low ranks (member) hope with a taste of the pile at signature. Still, it's only acceptable that you go with what your contractors want.Good to have you managing again and congratulations in between.
